SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.collectables

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.collectables.Item
com.tloj.game.collectables.Weapon
Record Components:
lvl - is the weapon's level that is increased via WeaponShard and Smith (each level adds 1 damage point to the dice roll)
Direct Known Subclasses:
CyberKatana, LaserBlade, NaniteLeechBlade, NanoDirk, PlasmaGreatsword, PulseStaff
public abstract class Weapon extends Item
An abstract class that represents a weapon that can be used to attack enemies
Different weapons have different effects that are applied to the target when they are hit
They are also equipped with a Dice that is rolled to determine the damage dealt to the target (in addition to the player's base damage stat).
See Also:
  • WeaponEffect
